entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
